description:
Calculate the total of your purchase no matter what the sale may be.  ShopEasy Discounts! Pro is the must have shopping companion for bargain shoppers.  15% off t-shirts, 30% off jeans and 10% off your entire purchase?  It's not a problem with Discounts! Pro.  This app will tally your discounted items, take a discount off the entire purchase, and even calculate the tax.  Know what you are spending before you step up to the register.  
   ShopEasy Discounts! Pro allows you to choose items, cuts and colors of your most popular shopping items with a single click.  Calculating an unusual item?  Every selection field also has a custom input field. Change your mind about an item?  Simply swipe across the item on the tally receipt and  delete it from the list.
   The tally receipt also has settings to allow you to add sales tax (enter your local tax rate) and a discount for your entire sale. 
 ShopEasy Discounts! Pro is the must have App for those busy shopping days! 
 Available in English and formats to your local currency.
